tourBios.curYearHigh: Enjoyed his best outing of the season when he was T7 at the Boeing Classic which included a closing-round 5-under-par 67.
Enjoyed his best outing of the season when he was T7 at the Boeing Classic which included a closing-round 5-under-par 67.

tourBios.otherVics: (11): 1999 New Jersey State Open. 2003 New Jersey PGA Section Championship. 2006 NJPGA Match Play Championship. 2007 New Jersey Section PGA Championship, NJPGA Match Play Championship. 2009 New Jersey PGA Section Championship. 2010 New Jersey PGA Section Championship, New Jersey Stroke-Play Championship, New Jersey Charity Classic. 2013 NJPGA Senior Open Championship. 2014 Senior PGA Professional National Championship.
tourBios.curYearHigh: Enjoyed his best outing of the season when he was T7 at the Boeing Classic which included a closing-round 5-under-par 67.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Earned fully-exempt status for 2015 by earning medalist honors at the Champions Tour National Qualifying Tournament at Orange County National near Orlando in November. Fired a 5-under-par 67 in the third round to build a three-stroke advantage after 54 holes and closed with a 1-under-par 71 to finish four ahead of runner-up Grant Waite...The victory climaxed a productive two-week run for him. Just days earlier, he won the Senior PGA Professional National Championship by four strokes at the PGA GC in Port St. Lucie, Fla., which earned him a berth in the 2015 PGA Championship at Whistling Straits...He played in three Champions Tour events during the year prior to his victory at the Q-School...Open-qualified at the Mississippi Gulf Resort Classic, where he finished T45...Also qualified for the U.S. Senior Open at Oak Tree GC but missed the cut after rounds of 75-82...Was T39 at the Senior PGA Championship.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: A long-time club professional in the New Jersey area, he has amassed a number of titles in his home state as well as the 2014 Senior PGA Professional National Championship...Was named the New Jersey PGA Player of the Year four times and was inducted into the New Jersey PGA Hall of Fame in 2010...Played in the 1998 and 2014 PGA Championships and also qualified for the 1992 U.S. Open at Pebble Beach...Also played in the 1992 Buick Classic and the 1989 Manufacturers Hanover Westchester Classic....Made a pair of starts on the 1998 Web.com Tour, making the cut and finishing 55th at the Hershey Open.
tourBios.personal: Most recently served as the head professional at Brooklake CC in Florham Park, N.J...Introduced to the game at age eight by his father and credits him for getting him involved in the game.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Champions was T7th in 2015 at the Boeing Classic.
